nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse
[Groovy] Class GrailsStatementExecutor

java.lang.Object
  nl.jworks.fitnesse.ProtectedStatementExecutor
      nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse.GrailsStatementExecutor

class GrailsStatementExecutor
extends ProtectedStatementExecutor

This is the API for executing a SLIM statement. This class should not know about the syntax of a SLIM statement.
